Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the village of Port Chester occupancy tax for two years
Summary: Extends the village of Port Chester occupancy tax until December 31, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 509 of the laws of 2016, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the imposition of an occupancy tax in the village of Port Chester, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
